Class ConstructionStateHourglass

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.ConstructionStateHourglass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConstructionStateHourglass extends Object implements Serializable
The hourglass used during a LevelTwoConstructionState.

      Constructs a ConstructionStateHourglass object.

      seconds - Number of seconds the ConstructionStateHourglass lasts.
      times - Number of times the ConstructionStateHourglass can be turned.
